dmca.title: WWE DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam:

 

World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc. ("WWE") is the exclusive owner of
numerous trademarks, service marks, trade dress and copyrights,
including, but not limited to, WWE, the WWE logo, RAW, SmackDown, ECW,
WCW, as well as all of its talent images, likenesses, and rights of
publicity.  WWE, as the premier provider of wrestling entertainment
services, has through extensive use and promotion of its intellectual
property, established substantial and valuable good will in its
intellectual property.  As such, WWE vigilantly protects its
intellectual property rights and does not tolerate any infringement of
the same.

 

WWE has discovered that its copyrighted images, programming and/or
hyperlinks to this content have been uploaded to various users accounts
on your site, without the authorization of WWE.  This infringing content
is located all over the <ultimatefightdownloads.com> website, and can
exemplified at the following URLs:

 

http://ultimatefightdownloads.com/2011/06/pedido-capitol-punishment-2011
-john.html

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/search/label/WWE%20RAW

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/2011/06/download-wwe-raw-power-to-
people-200611.html

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/2011/06/download-wwe-raw-all-star-
night-130611.html

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/2011/05/download-wwe-raw-300511.ht
ml

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/search/label/WWE%20SmackDown

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/2011/06/download-wwe-smackdown-170
611.html 

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/2011/04/download-wwe-smackdown-010
411.html 

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/search/label/Pay-Per-View%27s

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/2011/06/pedido-over-limit-2010-rey
-mysterio-vs.html

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/2011/06/pedido-download-30-man-roy
al-rumble_28.html

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/2011/06/pedido-hell-in-cell-2009-j
ohn-cena-vs.html

http://www.ultimatefightdownloads.com/2011/06/pedido-capitol-punishment-
2011-randy.html

 

WWE has sent DMCA takedowns for the <ultimatefightdownloads.com> domain
before. Therefore, WWE not only demands the immediate removal of these
videos, broadcasts, and these Blogger user accounts, but also requests
the suspension of this entire domain and associated account.  I have
good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials described
above and contained on the service is not authorized by the copyright
owner, WWE, its agent, or by protection of law.

 

I swear under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.  The demands made herein are not made to the
exclusion of other remedies to which WWE is entitled and WWE
specifically reserves the right to seek all remedies available to it
under law as a result of these infringing activities.

 

Regards,

 

Matthew C. Winterroth

Associate Counsel, Intellectual Property

Business and Legal Affairs

World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.

[redacted]

Stamford, CT 06902

Tel:  [redacted]

Fax: [redacted]

E-mail:  matthew.winterroth@wwecorp.com
